page.title: 04Ponteland CARE Village
page.content: CARE - Community and Rural Enterprises have established a village for the mentally handicapped near Ponteland, Northumberland. The Patron of this registered charity is H.R.H. Princess Alexandra and The Hon. Mrs Angus Ogilvy G.C.V.O. CARE for mentally handicapped people' was founded and registered as a charity in 1966 with the simple aim of establishing rural village communities for the life-long care of mentally handicapped adults of both sexes who are not capable of being looked after at home.It came into existence with a borrowed capital of some Â£200 and the renting of a small farmhouse in Devon.Today,through careful husbanding of resources and active fund raising it has created six villages in Devon,Leicestershire,Susex,Lancashire, Kent and Northumberland.
